text: Nocardiopsis ganjiahuensis is a bacterium from the genus of Nocardiopsis which has been isolated from soil from the Ganjiahu Natural Reserve from the Xinjiang Province in China.UniProtDeutsche Sammlung von Mikroorganismen und Zellkulturen == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Nocardiopsis ganjiahuensis at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Actinomycetales Category:Bacteria described in 2008
title: Nocardiopsis ganjiahuensis
